alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walton County through 345 PM CDT... At 314 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eglin Air Force Base, or 9 miles north of Santa Rosa Beach, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Portland, Villa Tasso, Port Washington, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Pleasant Ridge, Gulf Pines, New Home, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Seagrove Beach, Sandestin, Mossy Head and Four Mile Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; North Walton; South Walton
